website_summaries.verdict: A durable, breathable polyester car cover that increases comfort and safeguards occupants from hot leather.
pros: Features a tough, ergonomic design that fits most sedan front seats
1-piece assembly attaches to the seat with elastic for a snug fit
Can shield your vehicle from pet damage and is easy to install
cons: Does not fit bench seats, high-back seats, seats with armrests, bucket seats, or seats without detachable headrests

customer_reviews.title: It’s looking great and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just receive 2 cover today for my husband ram3500 2018 . It’s looking great and fit perfect. Beautiful color, I don’t know how long this going to be last yet but the material seem very well made . Love it 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kay Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: 2019 Jeep Grand Cherokee
customer_reviews.text: I knew it wasn't supposed to be a perfect fit for a 2019 Jeep Grand Cherokee, but it's still very good. It's a bit too tight on the sides since the vehicle seats are a bit large for it. I expect it will eventually rip at some of the weaker side fabric, but that's an easy repair while modifying with a section of elastic, if necessary. It also has some extra height that gathers a bit at the top of the seat, but again not a big deal. The color is a perfect match for the beige interior. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: fit is good.
customer_reviews.text: O these covers look just like I pictured them on my seats, the color is a really good match, (tan) , I have a 2006 conversion van , wasn't sure they would fit the two back captains chairs being that they are big size seats, but they fit perfectly, sure beats getting the professional ones done, let's hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Ween Machine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I had just bought a new car and my beige driver's seat was getting dirty, so I wanted something that would match my interior, comfort, and easy to install. This seat is perfect, buy it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mille's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very functional & great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s car. She has leather seats that are unbearable to sit on in hot weather. It fit well, was easy to put on, and she says it doesn’t slide around and it is pretty comfy. I’m gonna buy another for the passenger’s side.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Chastine

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Looks great and fits my seat nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice seat cover. Quality material. Easy to install. Just happens to match my interior color perfectly. It is soft and comfortable material to sit on. Just what I hoped for to protect my seats from sweat when I travel back and forth to the beach. I only wish now I had bought the whole set for front and back seat as well!
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, unpretty
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this purchase. You only get one cover and it's ugly, cheaply made, bulky and uncomfortable. It's also a little darker beige than what I was anticipating. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: primavera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking; tough material. Bought one as a test; the 2nd couple of weeks later. Install is simple; fits my seats perfectly = looks great. So far they stay in place; no hassle rearranging. Just excellent.
customer_reviews.author: GEW

customer_reviews.title: Fit the seat well, look nice, extra storage with pockets in front and back
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I bought them to protect my new cream colored leather seats. They did not smell bad at all, installed easily, and I love that I have some extra pockets. I dont know yet about the cooling. Since I have a light interior, they don't get as hot as a dark interior.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Finally I have found the car seat cover, which makes me happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new car seat cover. Before I had bought several different car seats, but they didn't work for me for various reasons. This time, it works. It looks elegant, does not have wrinkles or squeeze together. The material and stitches are perfect. The color is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: I really like this seat it fits perfect in my 1996 gmc ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this seat it fits perfect in my 1996 gmc ex cab pickup look great keep my back cool just like they said it would.I like to know if it comes in a different color.I would hate to spray paint it .and lose it coolest to keep my back cool.
customer_reviews.author: Do this fit my 1997gmc safari van

customer_reviews.title: Look Good
customer_reviews.text: Good material and feel good, the only thing more coverage around the seat to protect wear. However, this seat is quality made
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Horikami

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not looking good from the back
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice, soft quality material, looks good from the front, kind of ugly from the back. If you have rear passengers , they will see straps on the back of seat like straps from woman bra :). So the look from the back is my only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Denis from FL

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my driver side car seat. Looks great. Compliments from my friends on the look Cooler to drive in the summer heat. No more sweaty back.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good seat cover! This is thick and nice and doesnt move around. Not like those cheap ones with the foam and elastic that always rolls up. Best seat cover I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a car seat cover Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a car seat cover Easy to put on, takes just seconds, fits well. So comfortable. And they do not shift around. Great product. Bought one to try it out but now I am ordering 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: maryel2

customer_reviews.title: Breathable Bucket Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking seat covers for my Lexus at a great price
customer_reviews.author: katzmeow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly a 2013 Dodge Caravan! Looks very nice, almost OEM, and very comfortable. I might get another for passenger side
customer_reviews.author: P. D.

customer_reviews.title: These made my car new again
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in nice packaging. High quality covers that make my beetle look so good. Comfortable and cool to sit on fits well and looks great. We are very pleased with covers.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Lee McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is cool and comfortable yet you can barely tell it is there.
customer_reviews.author: bioprof

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Secured in different places but does slide some when I get in the car.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: It is first class quality!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this seat cushion/seat cover is fantastic it fits great looks great covers my set top (with cracks) gulky and it is very comfortable. I will by one for my wife's car next.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Hook

customer_reviews.title: It's good. Not excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Not excellent. The instructions didn't work for the headrest clips but its not hard to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Can I buy back seat cover only?
customer_reviews.text: Great seat covers. Long lasting and great quality. Bought for driver seat and then passenger front seat. I would love to get seat cover for the back seat, however they only sell them as part of a complete set. How can I buy it only for the back seat?
customer_reviews.author: KRISTAQ

customer_reviews.title: Love the seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the seat cover! I needed something cooler because the seats in my convertible get hot when the top is down. These keep my seats significantly cooler and no more sweaty back and legs. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Bought second one for car.....worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was easy to install on 2019 Subaru Outback..feels good ...looks better than I thought...worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Joe J. Olivarez

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: EASY install. Great result. Ordered one as I drive this car (Outback) all the time. As soon as she tried it, my little bride had me order one for the passenger seat! Also, just happens to be a perfect color match...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical but ordered these for our 2018 Nissan rogue could not be more pleased they look like and feel like they were made for this car absolutely love them and they stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Summers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional fit and appearance. Extremely impressed with the quality also.
customer_reviews.author: Jay R Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: It fit my 2018 Impreza perfectly and was easy to install. I love the little pockets in the front of the seat where your calves touch the seat. The packaging was very, very nice and the quality is also very good. I'm going to buy a second one for the passenger side now that I know that it fits and that the quality is great. Don't hesitate to buy if you're worried about the quality. Also, shipping was fast with UPS tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these covers
customer_reviews.text: Love these covers. I have beige interior and they match and look luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on both my cars & love them!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

product_meta.title: Qbedding Soothing Drive All Season Universal Fit Breathable Car Seat Cover (Plaid, One Piece)
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 51"L x 21"W (Fits most standard sedan front seats)
MATERIAL: Polyester, FEATURES: Breathable, Durable, Ergonomic Design
Single Piece Design attaches to seat with elastics ensuring a secure & snug fit.
(DOES NOT FIT BENCH SEAT, HIGH BACK SEAT, BUCKET SEAT, AND ARMREST SEAT)

This car seat cover is for those of you who has old uncomfortable car seats, or people who don't want to get burned by your leather seats in a hot summer day. Or you just simply want a new look in your car.
